item.description:
Susty's is a completely Vegan restaurant. I'm sorry to change the day from Saturday to Sunday at this late date. As long as the anti-fur demonstrations are on Saturday I don't want to conflict.

Thanks to everyone who helped last week. Please consider helping out if you
haven't yet. It really is a pretty easy thing to do to bring the cruelty of
fur to the public's attention.
Thanks,
Linda

Dino's International Furs
135 Lafayette Road (Rt 1)
North Hampton, NH

Sat Feb 2 Noon - 2:00pm
Sat Feb 16 Noon - 2:00pm

Signs will be provided, but feel free to bring your own. Dress warm!!!

Please park across the street in the residential area, but do not block any
driveways.

For further information please reply to this message or feel free to
contact:

Christy LaRose - Portsmouth Animal Outreach - 603-502-5925
Danalyn Adams - Portsmouth Animal Outreach - 603-828-6219
Linda Dionne - NH Animal Rights League - lindld@comcast. net

'Each year, millions of animals are trapped, drowned, or beaten to death in
the wild and gassed, strangled, or electrocuted on fur farms. Their skins
are ripped off, sometimes while they are still alive, and made into fur
coats and collars. Stop the cruelty - never buy fur or fur trim.' ~
www.FurIsDead. com

To further educate yourself on the fur trade visit www.hsus.org and read
about their fur-free campaign. Read 'Faux or Feline? The Truth in Fur
Labeling Act Will Help You Choose.' Yes...feline.

Look forward to seeing a great group out there!

Christy LaRose
Portsmouth Animal Outreach
item.name: The Manchester Vegan February Meetup
